metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6076 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In versions of wolfSSL before 3.10.2 the function fp_mul_comba makes it easier to extract RSA key information for a malicious user who has access to view cache on a machine.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-6076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 3.13.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.13.0+dfsg-1').
